articles.author: Bailey Rahn
articles.text:
Some of the best cannabis strains we enjoy today migrated from the growers and seed banks of Canada. Since the 1990s when cannabis activism was revived with the opening of “hemp stores,” Canada has been a hotspot for new crossbred varieties.
Here are some of Leafly’s newcomers:
1. Blue God
Characteristics of Blue God:

100% indica
Breeder: Jordan of the Islands
Cross between God Bud and Blueberry
Berry aroma
Offers full-body relief
May help with pain and sleep disorders
Soil preferred for growing
55-60 day flowering time

2. Lethal Purple
Characteristics of Lethal Purple:

80% indica
Breeder: Great White North
Floral aroma
Offers full-body relief with mental clarity

3. Endless Sky
Characteristics of Endless Sky:

90% indica
Breeder: Greenthumb Seeds
Cross between Grenadine and Iranian landrace
Earthy, hashy aroma
Offers spacey, dreamy effects
Hydroponics preferred for growing
42-50 day flowering time

4. Lowryder
Characteristics of Lowryder:

Hybrid
Breeder: Joint Doctor Seeds
Cross between Ruderalis and Northern Lights #2 x William’s Wonder 
Dwarf-sized plant that grows no higher than 40cm
Earthy aroma
Slow onset with balanced head and body effects
Hardy plants with a 40-45 day flowering time

5. Sapphire Star
Characteristics of Sapphire Star:

60% sativa
Breeder: Jordan of the Islands
Cross between Blue Hawaiian sativa and God Bud
Berry, skunky aroma
Cerebrally energizing, physically calming
49-56 day flowering time

photo credit: Ian Muttoo via photopin cc
articles.title: Five New Cannabis Strains with Canadian Origins

description: Blue God, bred by Jordan of the Islands in Canada, is a powerful indica mothered by God Bud and Blueberry. Fulfilling all of our indica expectations, Blue God produces crushing full-body effects ideal for nighttime treatment of pain and sleep disorders. With age, Blue God develops a sweet berry aroma and deep purple leaves freckled in frosty resin. Cultivators of this stout indica suggest growing Blue God as a multi-branch plant in soil, with a flowering period between 55 and 60 days.
descriptionPlain: Blue God, bred by Jordan of the Islands in Canada, is a powerful indica mothered by God Bud and Blueberry. Fulfilling all of our indica expectations, Blue God produces crushing full-body effects ideal for nighttime treatment of pain and sleep disorders. With age, Blue God develops a sweet berry aroma and deep purple leaves freckled in frosty resin. Cultivators of this stout indica suggest growing Blue God as a multi-branch plant in soil, with a flowering period between 55 and 60 days.

highlightedReviews.text:
Medium sized, dense buds, covered in trichomes. Half a bud was more than a bowlful. Nice scent, I knew I wanted it as soon as the jar was opened. Tasty. EXCELLENT PAIN MED. Definitely couch locked, kind of spacey and scattered. Perfect for soaking in the tub while listening to a Peter Gabriel soundtrack. Excellent spatial hearing effect, watching TV I could sense certain sounds bouncing off of various surfaces. Fell asleep on the couch, hardly saw my show at all ...Zzzzz...went to bed and slept through the night.

11 days later- I haven't used as much because I have had sativa early evening to keep going.  I really do still love this stuff. In fact, when 1/4s were on for $50, I grabbed one. Very good for toke and soak- and pretty sleepy at the end. Excellent pain relief.

I am a big fan of sativas, so I always been leery when I will smoke an indica one, because I dont what expect. However, Blue God was an amazing surprise for me. A mix of relax and happiness. A bliss went trough my mind. I love it ! Peace Vibrations

name: Blue God
